## Carry Recipe
_Front Torso Cross Carry – Base Size – Torso Pass + Two Reinforcing Passes_
Torso Pass (Optional: Fold wrap hot dog style with rails up)
Cross in Back and bring tails over shoulders
Slide baby in pocket and tighten
Slide tails down to go under arms instead of over shoulders
Two bunched Reinforcing Passes
Tie in back
